Config Management Camp

5 - 7 February, 2018

Gent, Belgium

Salt & Foreman best of friends ?

Greg Sutcliffe

I'm new to Salt (just a few months in) but a long time Foreman user, and while I have my own wishlist of improvements, I'd to hear from the Salt community about how to collaborate on improving it.

In this talk I'd like to present the current state of the Salt plugin for Foreman, and then have an open discussion on how we can drive it forward to new and greater thingskk

About Speaker

Greg Sutcliffe is the Community Lead for Foreman, and should therefore really know what he's talking about. This rarely happens :)
